BackstoryDef.title: COMPNOR affiliate
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]’s parents, loyalists of the New Order, pledged [PAWN_objective] to the Sub-Adult Group—the Empire’s noblest youth cadre. \nDaily drills and doctrinal study forged unquestioning faith. They ranked top-tier, blissfully shielded from the Empire’s necessary sacrifices. \nHail to the Emperor, the Empire, and the New Order. May its righteousness never falter!
